Class LoanController

java.lang.Object
banking.application.controller.Controller
banking.application.controller.LoanController

Controller containing loan operations

    • TakeLoan

      @PostMapping("/take") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> TakeLoan(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid LoanInput loanInput)
      Endpoint to take loan
      Parameters:
      loanInput - input of loan
      Returns:
      loan entity or error when no account found (no standard account)

    • PayLoan

      @PutMapping("/pay") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> PayLoan(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid PayLoanInput payInput)
      Endpoint to pay account's loan
      Parameters:
      payInput - information about payment
      Returns:
      money left after payment or threw error

      @PutMapping("/autoPayment/{autoPay}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> SetAutoPayment(@PathVariable boolean autoPay)

      Parameters:
      autoPay - true for turning on, false for turning off
      Returns:
